description: I'm a Innovative Senior Software Developer with Expertise in C#, ASP.Net, MS SQL, MVC Secure Communication and Data Protection
skills: MS SQL Server Management and Optimization
detailOrQuote: With over a decade of experience as a Senior Software Developer and Team Lead, I specialize in designing and implementing innovative software solutions with a strong focus on Microsoft technologies. My expertise includes developing secure communication applications, dynamic dashboards, and comprehensive management systems using ASP.NET Core, WinForms, MS SQL Server, and front-end technologies like JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap.
